client.models

Interface IProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyProxy, Proxy

    public interface IProxy

    • Method Detail

      • postUserLogin

        ServerResponse postUserLogin(User user)
        calls the user login method on the server
        Parameters:
        the - User object that is being logged in. Holds the username and password

      • postUserRegister

        ServerResponse postUserRegister(User user)
        this calls the method on the server to register a new user
        Parameters:
        the - User object that will be registered

      • getGamesList

        GameServer[] getGamesList()
        This will retrieve all current games on the server
        Returns:
        an array of Game objects

      • postGamesCreate

        ServerResponse postGamesCreate(CreateGame game)
        Posts a new game that has just been created
        Parameters:
        the - Game object that was just created to start a new game

      • postGamesJoin

        ServerResponse postGamesJoin(ServerJoinGame join)
        Joins the game on the server
        Parameters:
        The - Game that this client wants to join

      • postGameReset

        ServerResponse postGameReset()
        Sends a game to reset it on the server
        Parameters:
        the - game that needs to be reset

      • movesSendChat

        ServerResponse movesSendChat(ServerChat chat)
        posts a chat message to the server
        Parameters:
        the - Chat object that needs to be posted

      • movesRollNumber

        ServerResponse movesRollNumber(ServerRoll roll)
        Rolls the dice for you and returns the number rolled
        Returns:
        the integer rolled

      • moveRobPlayer

        ServerResponse moveRobPlayer(ServerRobPlayer rob)
        Sends the request to rob a certain player by giving the Thief and the Player objects
        Parameters:
        the - current thief object
        the - player object being robbed

      • movesFinishTurn

        ServerResponse movesFinishTurn(FinishedTurn turn)
        Sends the player indicating that player has finished their turn
        Parameters:
        the - player object who is finishing their turn

      • movesBuyDevCard

        ServerResponse movesBuyDevCard(BuyDevCard card)
        Sends a player to the server that wants to buy a dev card
        Parameters:
        the - player object that is buying a dev card
        Returns:
        returns the DevCard object just bought
